Key Match Events: Steph Curry hit a dagger three against OKC in Sunday's win, pulling out his 'Night Night' celebration afterwards.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Steph Curry made a post on Instagram after defeating OKC, adding Luke Combs' 'Ain't No Love In Oklahoma' to the post, captioned 'Solid Trip. Now- Back to the crib!'
Others: Fans reacted to Steph Curry's subtle shot at the OKC Thunder, calling him the 'Petty King.'
